title: (x) Finest Brick Maker italic serif - ITC Giovanni {Yves}
content:
Can someone ID this font - the M is quite unique

comments.content: This is [Robert Slimbach](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Robert%20Slimbach)â€™s [ITC Giovanni](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604065101/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=ITC.108261.0.6&attributes.sampleSize=32&sampleText=Finest+Brick+Maker&sampleSize=32), either Bold or Black Italic, slightly [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/wiki/squooshed).
